婙字的基本解释

婙
jìng
古同“婧”。

婙字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jìng］
［《廣韻》疾政切，去勁，從。］
［《廣韻》子盈切，平清，精。］
［《廣韻》疾郢切，上静，從。］
亦作“婙1”。
(1)苗条美好貌。
(2)指美女。
(3)女子名。春秋时齐人衍之女名婧。见《列女传·辩通》。

婙字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　婙； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页264第33
【正字通】俗婧字。

婙字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
婙字的起名意思

古同"婧"。

婙
Basic explanation of words
婙
jìng
Gu Tong "Jing".
婙
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jìng］
["Guangyun" swiftly politically cut, go hard, follow. ]
["Guangyun" Zi Ying cut, calm and refined. ]
["Guangyun" sharply cut, Shangjing, from. ]
Also known as "婙1".
(1) Slim and beautiful.
(2) Refers to beautiful women.
(3) Female name. In the Spring and Autumn Period, Qi Renyan's female name is Jing. See "Biography of Women · Defence".
婙
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　婙; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 264 33
【Zhengzitong】vulgar Jingzi.
